name: New MAN
description:
[WARNING: Explicit language in the game!]

New MAN is a 2D beat 'em up adventure game with a sprinkle of the visual novel genre where you play as John, who was locked up in an unknown building by an unknown person trying to escape and get revenge using the martial art skills you practised while held captive. To do so you have to fight your way through the building until the top where hopefully you can confront your captors.

I'm the sole developer of this game, and it's made in Stencyl!

CREDITS:

All Soundtracks: Anamanaguchi

All Character Sprites: spriters-resource.com
